@whez You wrote "You don't root for the boyfriend/husband in NTRs. You're supposed to self insert yourself in the guy who is STEALING the girl" . This is like saying " While watching a horror movie you're supposed to self insert yourself in the guy who KILLS others" Only an idiot would think that way . And NTr doesnt only happen with boyfriends or husbands u moron, mothers and sisters can also be ntred. Not to mention, in this story the guy wasn't the boyfriend of the girl but only liked her.

@whez : I get what you saying, but but . . . among almost E V E R Y single NTR i've read so far, . . . this is the most devastating one.  the story development just doesn't give you any choise but to feel for the MC. I know the basic of enjoying NTR, but this is so well made. great art, nice story. damn smooth ugly fuck. Hands down for the artist. I will looking forward for his future masterpieces

oh yeah, just saying : the one doujin close to this in my opinion is the one with tittle (tachibana no dansei jijou), but still can'y beat this art style and detail.

Holy shit, this has hands down the best art I've seen in any doujin. The creases in the clothes, which hug the body in all the right places, the attention to detail of the girl's anatomy, and best of all she actually has a realistic looking nose. And for once, the coloring doesn't looked like they filled the black and white mange with colors on MS Paint. Also, I don't get why people even look up NTR and then complain about the boyfriend getting cheated on. You don't root for the boyfriend/husband in NTRs. You're supposed to self insert yourself in the guy who is STEALING the girl.

This legit made me mad and actually feel for the MC. Right as the new girl that has feelings for him asks if he's okay, I was like "finally he'll be happy" but no he got cucked. I read plenty of NTR manga but damn this one got me salt. Like a wise man once said, "All women are thots."

@ketsuma - The feeling of jealousy, your crush being taken away, it fits in the NTR category… and if you read the whole thing, she maybe had a thing for the main guy, when she asked "so you still love me?", but they got stopped... also there's the other girls who likes the main guy but turned to the fat guy because she thought the main guy would never go out with her, knowing he's in love with Karen...
